items.content_html: #eMacs has a lot of commands, I want to use #orgMode without having to memorise everything first, so this #plugin called casual-suite, which is like a mashup of cheat sheets and Mac OS searchable menus might work nicely. Different but also a little like the VS Code style command bar feature.
items.content_text: #eMacs has a lot of commands, I want to use #orgMode without having to memorise everything first, so this #plugin called [casual-suite](https://github.com/kickingvegas/casual-suite), which is like a mashup of cheat sheets and Mac OS searchable menus might work nicely. Different but also a little like the VS Code style command bar feature.

items.title: Liquid foods for sick days
items.content_html:
• Powerade Mountain Blast (always have one on hand)

  • Vly Erbsen-Drink High Protein vegan

  • Rewe frei von Weiße Schokolade mit Crispies laktosefrei glutenfrei

  • Vitamin Well Antioxidant

  • Vitamin Well Hydrate Erdbeer & Rhabarber

  • Innocent Direktsaft Blaubeere, Apfel, Johannisbeere & Cranberry
